tool.name: CNVkit Reference
tool.description: Compile a copy-number reference from the given files or directory (containing normal samples).
tool.command: ln -s '$input_cnn_file' ./tumor.targetcoverage.cnn && #if $customise_the_CNV_reference_using_expected_coverrage.antitargets ln -s '$customise_the_CNV_reference_using_expected_coverrage.antitargets' ./antitargets.bed && #end if #if $customise_the_CNV_reference_using_expected_coverrage.targets ln -s '$customise_the_CNV_reference_using_expected_coverrage.targets' ./targets.bed && #end if #if $advanced_settings.reference_source.fasta #if str($advanced_settings.reference_source.ref_selector) == 'history': ln -s '$advanced_settings.reference_source.fasta' ./genome.fa && samtools faidx ./genome.fa 2>&1 || echo 'Error running samtools faidx for indexing fasta reference for CNVkit' >&2 && #else ln -s '$advanced_settings.reference_source.fasta.fields.path' ./genome.fa && cp ln -s '${advanced_settings.reference_source.fasta.fields.path}.fai' ./genome.fa.fai && #end if #end if cnvkit.py reference ./tumor.targetcoverage.cnn --output ref-tas.cnn $advanced_settings.cluster #if $advanced_settings.min_cluster_size --min-cluster-size '$advanced_settings.min_cluster_size' #end if #if $advanced_settings.sample_sex --sample-sex '$advanced_settings.sample_sex' #end if $advanced_settings.male_reference #if $customise_the_CNV_reference_using_expected_coverrage.targets --targets ./targets.bed #end if #if $customise_the_CNV_reference_using_expected_coverrage.antitargets --antitargets ./antitargets.bed #end if $disable_some_of_the_bias_corrections.no_gc $disable_some_of_the_bias_corrections.no_edge $disable_some_of_the_bias_corrections.no_rmask
tool.help: Compile a copy-number reference from the given files or directory (containing normal samples). If given a reference genome (-f option), also calculate the GC content and repeat-masked proportion of each region.
